name: Zoho Notebook
description: Note-taking app for organizing thoughts, ideas and information

opengraph.title: The Best Notes App to Stay Organized & Productive | Notebook
opengraph.description: Our all-in-one notes app lets you take notes, manage to-dos and tasks, collaborate with others, and sync across devices in a secure, ad-free space.
